name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **Node.js**, **VueJS**, and modern JavaScript technologies to build high-performance applications. My strong skills in **CSS**, **HTML**, and various tools such as **Git**, **Webpack**, and **npm** enhance my development process and ensure efficient, scalable web solutions. I implement **Test-Driven Development** practices using **Mocha** and **Jest**, ensuring high-quality code and reliability in production environments. 

Beyond my proficiency in web technologies, I have substantial expertise in developing enterprise-grade platforms within the healthcare and financial sectors, integrating AI capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. I possess a strong foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation. My cloud experience spans both **Azure** and **AWS**, and I adhere to compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, I have hands-on experience in machine learning pipeline development and MLOps workflows utilizing tools such as MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow.
